archimate:Resource.name: Hierarchy and Relationship Manager
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is responsible for managing the data hierarchies, groupings, relationships such as parent-child relationships, and relationships between enterprise data. This ABB is leveraged by the Data Virtualization Manager to build the relationships.

properties.value: This ABB is responsible for managing the data hierarchies, groupings, relationships such as parent-child relationships, and relationships between enterprise data. This ABB is leveraged by the Data Virtualization Manager to build the relationships.
